= Welcome! =

If you are new to SLAM, you may wish to read the [Introduction] which explains in detail how it can help _you_ track and organize your research samples.

== Installation ==

If you've already downloaded SLAM, you can follow the step-by-step installation instructions [installation here] to get it up and running quickly.
